text: @JohnCornyn @WSJ Reading is fundamental. Help your child to read, letter recognition, forming words. All math begins with number recognition & counting. We learn everything else from these basics. No one learns anything in a grave. Keep our children safe, contain COVID-19 then we can fix schools
